Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1974...
Had first career hit on 5/4/1975, off Gregory Crandall (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/14/1975, off Carlos Lopez (CC)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1976...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Troy on 6/29/1977...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Gashouse on 8/20/1977...
Drove in 6 runs against Gashouse on 8/6/1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1980, hitting .667 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Halifax on 4/21/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1982, hitting .542 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1982, hitting .330 with 6 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Gashouse on 6/8/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Lynchburg on 7/5/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1985, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Troy on 6/28/1985...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Troy on 6/28/1985...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 8/11/1985...
Drove in 6 runs against Plum Grove on 10/1/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/14/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $2,895,600 per year...
